D G I L M S

D

decode() - Method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
The decode method is the main method of the class.
It will use other private methods to do the more simplest functions such as checks, informations reading/writing...
decode(File, File, File, File) - Static method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
Four parameters static method of the decode method.
decode(File, File, File) - Static method in class dicomreader.DicomReader
Three parameters static method of the decode method.
dicomreader - package dicomreader
DicomReader package contains classes needed by the application.
DicomReader - Class in dicomreader
The DicomReader class decodes Dicom files writing headers file and images files.
The image(s) files is simply composed of ascii pixel values ordered by rows and columns as in a trivial image.
DicomReader(File, File, File, File) - Constructor for class dicomreader.DicomReader
Four parametrs DicomReader class constructor.
The constructor simply initializes variables' values to file names passed as parameters to the class.
DicomReader(File, File, File) - Constructor for class dicomreader.DicomReader
Three parametrs DicomReader class constructor.
The constructor simply initializes variables' values to file names passed as parameters to the class.
DicomReaderGUI - Class in dicomreader
DicomReaderGUI class is the application's graphic user interface.
It refers to the DicomReader class.
DicomReaderGUI() - Constructor for class dicomreader.DicomReaderGUI
The class constructor puts all graphics application's components.
display() - Static method in class dicomreader.ShowGPL
The display method sets the window's dimensions and shows it in the center of the screen.
It executes the showResult method to show the GPL license file.
